title: Somewhere My Love (Laraâ€™s Theme)
lyrics:
[Verse]
Somewhere, my love, there will be songs to sing
Although the snow covers the hopes of spring
Somewhere, a hill blossoms in green and gold
And there are dreams, all that's your heart can hold
[Pre-Chorus]
Someday, we'll meet again, my love
Someday, whenever the spring breaks through
[Chorus]
You'll come to me out of the long-ago
Warm as the wind, soft as the kiss of snow
'Til then, my sweet, think of me now and then
Godspeed, my love, 'til you are mine again
[Instrumental Break]
[Pre-Chorus]
Someday, we'll meet again, my love
I said, "Someday, whenever that spring breaks through."
[Chorus]
You'll come to me out of the long-ago
Warm as the wind, and as soft as the kiss of snow
'Til then, my sweet, think of me now and then
Godspeed, my love, 'til you are mine again
